title: (x) ESPN Magazine cover type / Details Magazine text type - Locator / September {Dav}
content:
Hey everyone. Does anyone know the name? ESPN magazine’s typeface, the one with the number 3 looking lower case “e”. It’s on the cover of ESPN magazine digital ( [www.espnmag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128112807/http:/www.espnmag.com/)).

The second one is the text face for DETAILS magazine. Also used all uppercase on the cover.

Any help will be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
author: rosaiani

comments.content:
From Emigre [http://www.emigre.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128112807/http:/www.emigre.com/)

Funny they use that typeface to describe the so-called “Toughest Man”
nevermind i’m wrong … \*hangs head in shame\* … but it is still funny

_Without a sample_, _Id say the ‘DETAILS’ type is_ ‘September’, _by [Hubert Jocham](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Hubert%20Jocham)_.. :)

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128112807/http:/www.formlos.net/)

_Oh, and the ‘ESPN’ type is_ ‘ [Locator](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128112807/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/locatordisplay/index.html)’, _by [Eric Olson](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Eric%20Olson) / Process_..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128112807/http:/www.formlos.net/)
nice, formlos, i couldn’t remember his name, Jubert’s, I mean. d’oh!

Bull’s eye guys, thanks a lot!

Rodrigo Saiani
